第一个文本框是应用程序中文名\n第二个文本框是应用程序英文名\n第三个文本框是最:
The first is the application Chinese name text box
The second text box is application English name
The third one is a text box that ultimately make the description of the package
A fourth option box is a classification in the desktop file
The fifth input box is program in Wine vessel position, to the c: \ XXX's form, the drive must be lowercase, with a backslash, if the path with the USER name will be automatically replaced with $USER
While StartupWMClass fields will be automatically generated by the program, function is as follows:
The desktop file StartupWMClass fields.
The sixth input box is the package name of the resulting package, the package name begin with deepin naming rules, plus the website domain name (need change over) before and after, if can't distinguish between plus application name
The last one is the resulting package version number, version number naming rules: application version number + deepin + number
Tip: package name is the same as the container name, cannot be set to different, if you need to set up for different, need to use another based on the ecological adaptation of the script package
投稿到星火应用商店: Contribute to spark the app store
